pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Sunday, January 29, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Quebec City, Quebec

Private meetings

3:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mayor of Quebec City, Bruno Marchand. He will be joined by the Minister of Health, Jean-Yves Duclos.

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

4:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the families of the Quebec City Mosque tragedy victims.

Closed to media

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at a ceremony marking the 6th anniversary of the Quebec City Mosque tragedy. He will be accompanied by the Minister of Health, Jean-Yves Duclos, the Minister of Public Safety, Marco Mendicino, and the Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion, Ahmed Hussen.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:30 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
